oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women
Women
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Martha A. Jones (Mrs. Watson Meredith) Gentry wearing a lace-collared dress and three strands of pearls.

Martha A. (Jones) Gentry of Franklin, Tennessee, was the wife of Watson Meredith Gentry. Her daughter was Susie Gentry (1860-1944). Susie Gentry was a genealogist, artist, composer, historian, and regent of the Old Glory Chapter of the Daughters of the American Revolution in Williamson County.
